PHRASE.LANG: You have The Goods. Be alert. Don't take your eyes off them for a minute. They are watching.[#Legal]
Vous avez sur Les Biens. Soyez à l'affût. Ne prenez pas vos yeux les pendant une minute. Ils nous regardent.[#Legal]
You have The Goods. Be alert. Don't take your eyes off them for a minute. They are watching.[#Legal]
